definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="95" y="-3"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FlaregunAmmo</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:flare_gun_shot</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FlareGun</field></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:flare_gun_dry_shot</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
